description: While Gol D. Roger was still alive, he killed all the members of Squardo`s crew, which led Squardo to carry an intense hatred towards the Pirate King. Sometime later, he was taken in by Whitebeard, Roger`s enemy, at which time he was all alone. Squardo befriended Ace, without the knowledge of Ace being the son of his greatest enemy, and rebuilt his crew.
name: Squard
